author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

As a stepping stone to solve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43422 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43923, this PR extends the schema evolution test to cover a case where an `std::auto_ptr` class member is evolved to `std::unique_ptr`. With the first commit only and ROOT older than 6.36 the test will fail.

The second commit applies the recipe https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/43923#issuecomment-2898938773 to the test.

Needs the test file update from https://github.com/cms-data/IOPool-Input/pull/4

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1451

#### PR validation:

In ROOT6.36 the schema evolution unit test succeeds.
title: [ROOT636] Add test for schema evolution of auto_ptr -> unique_ptr
